title: Create a Quote for a Custom Product
description: A sales rep is working with engineering to create a quote for a new, custom-configured product.

tasks.description: Use the product configurator tool to select the required features and options for the custom product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent builds the custom product configuration.

tasks.description: Generate a cost estimate based on the selected configuration.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system calculates the total material and labor cost for the custom product.

tasks.description: Create a formal quote with the calculated price, the configuration details, and an estimated lead time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates and sends the detailed quote for the custom item.
